sentences.sentence: When I grow up, I'm gonna fly the fastest planes ever built, make the biggest movies ever and be the richest man in the world.
sentences.translation: 等我长大了，我要开世界上最快的飞机，拍世界上最宏大的电影，成为世界上最富有的人。

sentences.sentence: The cure to boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
sentences.translation: 无聊的解药是好奇心，但好奇心没有解药。

sentences.sentence: If no one else guards the world, then I will come forward.
sentences.translation: 如果没有别人保卫这个世界，那么我将挺身而出。

sentences.sentence: It's what you do right now that makes a difference.
To be or not to be - to live intensely and richly, or merely to exist, that depends on ourselves.
sentences.translation: 生存还是毁灭——活得热烈和丰富，还是只是简单存在，这全在于我们自己。
